main event: Witnesses observed a ball of fire near their car in Millinocket, Maine, on May 21, 1964.
interesting points: The ball of fire was estimated to be 3 feet in diameter and bounced around,The witnesses described the ball as being about the size of a bowling ball,One witness reported that when the ball seemed to fly off, it appeared much larger, like a small house,The witnesses felt frightened and initially returned to their car for safety,The ball of fire came within 6 feet of their car.
witness description: two individuals driving in a car
